name: FDUP HP
description:
FDUP HP，是個特殊又自由的換裝遊戲ლ(＾ω＾ლ)

FDUP HP, is a special and free dress up game ლ(＾ω＾ლ)

具有整齊分類和超展開的多結局故事關卡(≧ω≦)

Multiple ending story levels with neatly categorized and super-expanded (≧ω≦)

還有好玩的裝飾，讓你玩著更開心╰(*´︶`*)╯

There are also fun decorations to make you more fun╰(*´︶`*)╯

遊玩一次：2～15分鐘，故事關卡：10～40分鐘

Play once: 2 to 15 minutes, Story level: 10 to 40 minutes

（在Android，進入自由模式可能會退出，目前是測試版）

(On Android, entering free mode may exit, currently in beta)

如果遊戲很好玩或是有BUG，歡迎評價ヾ(@^▽^@)ノ

If the game is fun or has bugs, please comment ヾ(@^▽^@)ノ

記住！這款遊戲是完全免費的！不用破解～

remember! This game is completely free! Don't break it~

我的換裝遊戲隨時會更新

My dress up game will be updated at any time

⛔⛔⛔⛔⛔

請不要二次上傳到其他網站，也不要二次修改遊戲

Please do not upload it to other websites twice,

and do not modify the game twice

還有，不可以販賣這個遊戲(淘寶、蝦皮、積分金幣論壇......)

Also, this game cannot be sold (Taobao, Shopee, Point Gold Coin Forum...)

這遊戲原本往行動裝置設計，因為目前對Android優化不好，

開發困難，所以只有做PC版本

This game was originally designed for mobile devices, because the current Android optimization is not good and development is difficult, so only the PC version is available.

不可以拆包遊戲內容，禁止偷做有廣告的盜版遊戲

It is not allowed to unpack the game content, and it is forbidden to secretly make pirated games with advertisements

請用官方網址推薦我的遊戲

Please use the official website to recommend my game

如果你在其他論壇或網購網站買下它，表示你被騙了！！

If you buy it on other forums or online shopping sites,

it means you have been cheated! !

⛔⛔⛔⛔⛔

衣服問題80%會解決，程式問題10%會解決

80% of clothing problems will be solved, and 10% of program problems will be solved

這款遊戲需要很大的記憶體，電腦建議要16GB以上，手機可能6GB以上，可能要9以上

This game requires a lot of memory, it is recommended to have more than 16GB for computers, 6GB or more for mobile phones, and more than 9GB.

我沒有蘋果電腦，不能做IOS版本，MAC版本不知道能不能玩

I don't have an Apple computer, so I can't do the IOS version, and I don't know if the MAC version can play.

（就算有蘋果電腦，還是不做IOS版本）

(Even if there is an Apple computer, it still does not do the IOS version)

Android部份可以玩，建議用很好的新手機玩

Android part can be played, it is recommended to use a good new mobile phone to play

網頁版無法製作，除非有更適合的遊戲引擎

The web version cannot be made unless there is a more suitable game engine

這個遊戲容量很大，下載需要等30分鐘

This game has a large capacity, and it takes 30 minutes to download

如果你會程式或者找到更棒的引擎和插件

If you can program or find better engines and plugins

請DM我，幫我修好遊戲、增加新功能

Please DM me, help me fix the game and add new features

聯絡方式(contact method)：
